ENGLISH: It seems your troubles with [challenger.GetFullName] have finally come to the boiling point. [challenger.GetFirstNameWithNick] has issued a formal challenge, demanding you duel in the sacred tradition of Agni Kai. With such a challenge issued, there is no turning back. To refuse this duel now, would bring upon both you and your clan great dishonour.
I will gladly meet this challenge.
Even faced with disgrace, I will not fight!
Does the Dragon concern [Root.GetHerselfHimself] with the insects? All know [challenger.GetSheHe] is unworthy of my time.
It seems [From.GetFullName] isn't afraid to meet your challenge, formally accepting to terms of the Agni Kai. All that remains now is to travel out and meet [From.GetHerHim] on the duelling ground.
I am ready for this battle.

It seems [From.GetFullName] has decided shame and disgrace and a worthy price for survival. With the confirmation of [From.GetHerHis] dishonour, you have triumphed over your opponent with little more than words.
Words are all it takes to defeat cowards.

The time of the Agni Kai has finally arrived. Under sacred traditions, the first to burn their opponent emerges as the victor. [From.GetFullName] strides forward, ready to face you. Merely a glance at your opponent reveals [From.GetSheHe] is well built and a master of the Firebending arts. This might be a difficult battle.

The time of the Agni Kai has finally arrived. Under sacred traditions, the first to burn their opponent emerges as the victor. [From.GetFullName] strides forward, ready to face you. Merely a glance at your opponent reveals [From.GetSheHe] is of moderate build and a master of the Firebending arts. This might be a difficult battle.

The time of the Agni Kai has finally arrived. Under sacred traditions, the first to burn their opponent emerges as the victor. [From.GetFullName] strides forward, ready to face you. Merely a glance at your opponent reveals [From.GetSheHe] is of weak build and a master of the Firebending arts. [From.GetSheHeCap] may lack endurance, but [From.GetHerHis] Firebending skill is not to be underestimated.

Merely a glance at your opponent reveals [From.GetSheHe] is of moderate build but an unskilled Firebender. This battle should be a short one.

Merely a glance at your opponent reveals [From.GetSheHe] is of weak build and an unskilled Firebender. This battle should be pitifully short.
